studyArms.name: Brolucizumab 6 mg
studyArms.description: Intravitreal injection of 6 mg brolucizumab. Loading phase: 3 injections every 6 weeks (q6w) at Baseline, Week 6, and Week 12. Maintenance phase: q12w injections through Week 90, with potential extension up to q24w after Week 48.

studyArms.name: Panretinal Photocoagulation (PRP)
studyArms.description: Initial laser treatment in 1-4 sessions up to Week 12, followed by additional PRP treatment as needed up to Week 90.

arms.name: Brolucizumab 6 mg
arms.description: Intravitreal injection of 6 mg brolucizumab. Loading phase: 3 injections every 6 weeks (q6w) at Baseline, Week 6, and Week 12. Maintenance phase: q12w injections through Week 90, with potential extension up to q24w after Week 48.

epochs.name: Screening period
epochs.description: Day -21 to Day -1; assessment of eligibility and PDR status.

epochs.name: Single-masked treatment period
epochs.description: Day 1 to Week 90; randomized treatment administration.

epochs.name: Post-treatment follow-up period
epochs.description: Week 90 to Week 96; end-of-study assessments 6 weeks after last possible treatment.
